mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEM_CODE , MEMBER_ID , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DATE , ITEM_COMMENT , ITEM_STATUS , TRADE_TYPE , TRADE_ADDR , ATTACHED_NAME , IS_MAIN FROM SHOP_ITEM S, ITEM_IMG I WHERE I.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} AND S.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE ORDER BY IS_MAIN DESC

SELECT I.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ATTACHED_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(WISH_CODE) FROM WISH_LIST WHERE ITEM_CODE = S.ITEM_CODE) AS CNT_WISH_LIST FROM SHOP_ITEM S, ITEM_IMG I, WISH_LIST W WHERE S.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE AND S.ITEM_CODE = W.ITEM_CODE(+) AND S.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND IS_MAIN = 'Y' ORDER BY ITEM_CODE DESC
